transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Afternoon.
Executive: Sir, main aap se baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataye.
Executive: Sir actually mujhe aap se baat karni thi ki abhi main dekh pa rahi hu sir aap use is tarah se consume nahi kar pa rahe sir is wajah se.
Customer: Consume kya madam koi jab matlab ek to pehle to ye koi jab door ke rehti hai Pratapgarh Lucknow aur Prayagraj ki hai to wo matlab ki hamare nahi hai aur uske alawa jo nazdeek mein hoti hai to maine baat bhi kari to aap ab wo
Executive: Koi koi ek do installer wo khud hi nahi installer karte hain kehte hain sir hum to service bolte hain service dete hain is type ke to mili koi koi properly koi mere paas bheje nahi aap logon ne.
Customer: Mere paas to sir aapke paas filters hote hain na location ka jaise ho gaya to aapko aapko location ki lead chahiye. Theek hai sir aapko Lalganj ki chahiye. Jaise aapko Lalganj ki lead chahiye. Right?
Customer: Haan Lalganj aur surrounding mein lekin ab
Customer: Ab wo ab ab yahan se man lijiye Lucknow hai ya Azamgarh hai, Ballia hai to ye iska yahan ka to hamare yahan koi matlab bhi nahi hai na. Hmm.
Customer: Ki ye haan township to hum naam hum service bhi nahi de sakte hain na wo na koi de sakta. Ya de sakta?
Customer: To hamare liye to sab bekar hai humne jo paise jama kiye to isme hume lag raha hai ki hamari lagat bhi nahi nikal payegi kahin se ki hum to.
Executive: Nahi sir aisi baat dekho aapke paas leads aa rahi hain. Jaise agar main Lalganj ki baat karu wo kal aayi thi aur wo consume ho chuki hai. Sold out already ho chuki hai to uske liye aapko thoda assistant nahi kal koi aayi nahi hum tumhare paas humne dekha bhi hai.
Customer: Sir aapke paas. Okay okay. Main aapko bata deti hu.
Executive: Lucknow to aapko chahiye nahi.
Customer: Nahi Lucknow hamare yahan se hamare ko matlab nahi matlab Lucknow se kahan ho payega yahan se. Yahan se Lucknow ko bhi nahi sakta na.
Executive: Gorakhpur.
Executive: Gorakhpur, Bahraich.
Customer: Are madam yahan se Gorakhpur 400 kilometer hai.
Executive: Ek second sir. Bahraich yahan se 350 kilometer hai. Aapke near by state to yahi hai is tarah.
Customer: Lalganj mein near by aapka Bachhrawan ho gaya aapka Raebareli hai aur ye Dalmau hai. Ye aapka sab Lalganj near by mein hai ye aapko. Are aapke paas to map rehta hai aap usme dekh le ki kaun sa Lalganj mein. Main map mein hi dekh rahi hu Patna ho gaya Muzaffarpur ho gaya. Raebareli ho gaya. Are Patna Muzaffarpur Nagar Bihar mein hai madam kahan aap baat kar rahi hain.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Sir inquiry ka kaisa kya response hai jo aapke paas ek baar main list dekh rahi hu aapke paas jo inquiries aati hai inquiry ka sir kaisa kya response hai?
Customer: Nahi ab main jinse maine do teen se baat kari to ab kisi ne jab kisi ne mujhe bataya mujhe service ke liye chahiye aur haan aur kisi ne kuch kuch bataya ek ne pucha tha to humne bataya usko rate vagaira to uska response koi aaya nahi. Humne kaha theek hai wo dur tha wo bhi tha lekin usse baat kari thi. To uska bhi koi response nahi aaya.
Executive: Dekhiye sir jaise aap mujhe bata rahe ho aap apne near by cities mein aap deal karte ho theek hai to iske liye aapko jyada se system. To aapke paas jo sir leads vagaira aa rahi hai theek hai uske uske liye sir aapko active rehna padega sir.
Customer: Theek hai? Nahi to hum haan mere paas mobile laga main dekh bhi leta hu aisa nahi hai beech beech mein dekha karta hu. Hmm. Haan lekin ab mera isme kahin se kuch labh abhi tak matlab labh kya chodiye ab hamari kahin se lagat bhi nahi nikal rahi hai. Jo maine 36 se kitne 36000 jama kare hain to mera to lagbhag do mahine ke hisab se man lo 6000 mere bas chale gaye. Dekhiye madam agar ho jaye to mera refund kara dijiye jo jo bhi aapko idhar kaatne ho kaat ke mujhe refund kara dijiye. Kyunki hum bhi hamare liye puri tarah se nikal. Dekhiye aap isko use to kariye sir aap aap nahi to use use mein kya use mein kaise kaise kyunki hamare paas sir solar isme kafi sir business hai. Kafi leads aati hain aapse bhi hamare jo aapke hi area mein kafi sare suppliers hai jo in products mein deal karte hain. Main aapko bata deti hu jaise aapne jo products isme aapne add kiye hue hain na rukiye main jaise hamara hai ek aluminium solar power plant theek hai to solar power plant mein agar main dekh rahi hu to sir isme dekhiye Delhi ke Bhopal ke Sitara ke agar main aapke area ki baat karu Lalganj ki theek hai to Lalganj mein SR enterprises hai inko jante ho aap ek ek ample solar hai. Ek hai ye solar energy assistant solutions hai sir. Kya naam kya hai? Dekhiye main aapko company ka naam bata dijiye jo jis mein aap deal karte hain na isme hamare aur bhi sir supplier hai jo in mein deal kar rahe hain aur IndiaMART se hi deal kar rahe hain sir aisi baat nahi hai. Dekhiye pehle aapko bata deti hu SR enterprises hai Lalganj mein jante ho aap inko? SR enterprises? SR enterprises.
Customer: SR enterprises. SR Lalganj ka hi hai. Lalganj Raebareli? Ek hai Raebareli ka hai ample ample solar aap hi black deal karti hai usme. Pata nahi mujhe kaat de kaat. Nahi koi matlab pata nahi vendor ho gaya mujhe jankari nahi hai tamam. Ek second main bata deti hu vendor hai kya hai ek second. Trader hai sir. Hain?
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting relevant leads as per location.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.

- Wants a refund due to lack of business.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the filter options for leads.

- Executive provided information about local suppliers.

- Executive encouraged to use the platform effectively.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, location, suppliers, subscription
